description: The northernmost part of the main island of HonshÅ«, Aomori is a relaxing, smaller city to visit. My favourite destination was the unique Aomori custom of large, decorative floats displayed in the Warasse Nebuta museum. The city also has great views of Mutsu Bay from the large pier near the tourist center.
locations: Warasse Nebuta Museum, Aomori Tourist Information Center ASPAM
foods: Apple related products - apple pie, apple juice, apples, seafood
